1.0.name: wordpress/facebook-page-like-count
1.0.description:
Facebook Page Like Count is a simple plugin that allows you to display the total like count of any Facebook page. The Like Count can be added via shortcode or template tag to your theme.

Additional Features:

  • Ability to auto update the like count every hour, once daily, or twice daily

For more information or to request additional features, please visit the plugin page
